detail_desc: Gloves in soft leather with a zip at the top and a quilted padded section on the uppers. Fleece lining.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Concealed, zipped pockets in the side seams, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Jacket in breathable wind- and water-repellent functional fabric lined with a detachable fleece jacket, which means it can be worn as a shell jacket, a lined outdoor jacket or a separate fleece. The jacket has a lined, detachable hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets, a hook and loop tab at the cuffs and reflective details. Water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in woven fabric. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake pockets, and detachable, adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Shorts in stretch, matt silk cotton twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt  in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Rugby shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
3/4-length pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned cotton weave with and elasticated waistband with a drawstring. Fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket and elasticated hems.
Narrow belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Dress in cotton jersey with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative satin bow at the front, and a flared skirt in glittery tulle. Lined skirt.
Hooded jacket in a soft cotton blend with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in washed, sturdy cotton denim. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with thermal fleece inside. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets, ribbed panels at the sides and long raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved, turtle-neck blouse in a softly draping silk and viscose blend with a concealed zip at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and tapered legs.
Semi-opaque tights that shape the tummy, thighs and calves while also encouraging blood circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Low funnel collar, dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves and a straight-cut hem. The polyester content of the jumper is partly recycled.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet.
Long-sleeved nightdress in printed jersey with a button placket, ribbed cuffs and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and short, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit hat in soft wool.
Cap in a striped cotton weave with concealed elastication at the back.
Wide top in sturdy jersey with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with wide cuffs. Slightly shorter with a straight cut to the hem.
Top in cotton jersey with smocking at the top and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a hole pattern at the top, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt with a lace trim at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in big hole mesh with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim made from a soft, stretch Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist and slim, straight legs.
Jersey-lined outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and print motif at the top and on the back. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, V-neck dress in a softly draping viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with patch front pockets. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a short, fitted style.
Set with a sun hat and triangular scarf in patterned cotton. Sun hat with ties under the chin. Lined. Double-layered, triangular scarf with an adjustable press-stud fastening.

Skinny-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn and sequined details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly. Fake front pockets,real back pocket and cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with elastication at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves.
Trainers in velour with lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave. Smocked neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front, short raglan sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Short dress in a soft, airy viscose weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a small frill trim, and a seam and flare at the hem.
Trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons. Jersey lining.

Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Two flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Legs with sparkly stone stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Gilet in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets and a ribbed hem.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and welt front pockets with a flap.

Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with pin-tucks, a sewn-on fabric flower at the front and pearly buttons at the back. Seam at the waist and a gathered skirt for added width. Soft cotton poplin lining.
Cold shoulder top in smocked jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves with frill trims and a frill trim at the top and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dolman sleeves.
Pyjama shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly and side pockets.

Coat in sturdy twill made from a viscose blend with a stand-up collar with concealed press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Welt side pockets, one inner pocket, a zip at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.

Set with a top and dungarees in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved, patterned top with a press-stud on the shoulders. Dungarees with a print motif, appliqués, straps with a concealed fastening at the front, elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Longer, straight-cut jacket in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front, tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
Ribbed vest top in modal jersey with a gently rounded, raw-edge hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Strapless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a silicone trim at the top, side support and a concealed zip in the side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie and wide, ankle-length legs. Lined at the top.
Trousers in soft, patterned viscose jersey with side pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs. Wide, elasticated waistband for best fit over the tummy.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with pleats on the shoulders and elbow-length puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems.
Jazz trousers in sturdy cotton jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Shaping bikers in microfibre. High waist with a laser-cut edge and short legs with lace-trimmed hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Long jumper in a soft knit in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fancy dress costume with a top, pair of trousers and a hat in jersey with print motifs. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Hat with an elasticated hem and a fleece pompom on top.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Pull-on trousers in soft, slub-weave cotton with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and fake side pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué.

Fully lined, print-patterned bikini. Top with a narrow, adjustable halterneck, one strap with a small metal decoration. Wide flounce at the top that narrows at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with a decorative tie detail at the sides.
Short beach kaftan in airy, patterned chiffon with ties at the sides. No fasteners.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton slub jersey.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
